title: Score document schema
description: The schema for the score document I am designing.

courseName.description: The name of the golf course you played.

courseSide.description: Course section played: Front 9, Back 9, or Full 18

tees.description: Name of tees that were played.

date.description: The date the round was played in YYYY-MM-DD.

score.description: Total score. This could be calculated from the holesPlayed.

girPercentage.description: Percentage of greens hit in regulation. This can be calculated from holesPlayed.

teeAccuracy.description: Percentage breakdown of tee shot accuracy (Missed Left, Hit Fairway, Missed Right). This can be calculated from holesPlayed.

holesPlayed.description: An ordered list of scores for the golf holes played.

strokes.description: Total number of strokes including putts.

putts.description: Total number of putts for this hole.

driveResult.description: Result of your drive, Par3TeeShot if par 3

gir.description: True if green in regulation, False if not. This could be calculated using the formula (strokes-putts) - (par-2)
